scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-path:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.js -c -m -o build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-plugin-boilerplate/build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.js d3-plugin-boilerplate.v1.js && cp ../d3-plugin-boilerplate/build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.min.js d3-plugin-boilerplate.v1.min.js && git add d3-plugin-boilerplate.v1.js d3-plugin-boilerplate.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-plugin-boilerplate ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.js build/d3-plugin-boilerplate.min.js
